name: SpeedyVeggies
0:
”Alexa, ask Speedy Veggies to read me a dinner recipe”
”Alexa, tell Speedy Veggies i'd like a breakfast recipe”
”What are the ingredients?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: speedy veggies
des:
Feeling uninspired at mealtimes? This handy skill will read you different breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack recipes, and tell you how to make them. All you need to do is ask for a meal type, and Alexa will suggest a recipe. She will then continue to talk you through the instructions step-by-step.

The skill is strictly vegetarian, with the occasional suggestion for vegan alternatives. This is no Tasty, but there's plenty of eggy and cheesy goodness. Most of all though, plenty of veggies!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
